title: How Iron Phosphate batteries can become a green alternative to traditional lithium-ion batteries
description: Iron phosphate batteries (LFP) are increasingly seen as a greener alternative to traditional lithium-ion batteries due to their use of more abundant materials and greater thermal stability. While LFP batteries may have lower energy density, they offer longer lifespans and improved safety, fitting well in renewable energy and electric vehicle applications.
